channel.title: A debate?
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape community,
I'd like to tell a story to everyone, my moparscape advertisement page on http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php got deleted, probably because some other leecher took my last years source, didn't change the name and hosted it straight away. My advertisement had the same name "Vyrescape 745", the leecher had it "Vyre'. I lost about 2 months of advertisement, which got me nearly to 2'000 votes. I was ranked #4 on the list. Today, I log in, wanted to check out on our progress and saw, that our advertisement got deleted? For what? Why?
So my debate is about this: Is that normal that "Moparisthebest" is only seeking money? People work hard for this, yet he only cares about the dough? He hasn't even updated the status page list since he released that Beta? It still says this [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/535/m7u7.png[/img]
The year 2012. It'll soon be 2014 Mopar ;).
EDIT: You should check the IP's before doing that, you'd clearly see that I'm on the forums from my legit IP address. And registered the server from my VPS.
Maybe it's not your fault Mopar, maybe it's the status pages fault, because it is in Beta still. But I highly doubt that it only affected my advertisement just like that randomly.

item.title: A debate?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:7, topic:526982”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=645730.msg4343254#msg4343254 date=1375466235]

^ That’s MITB? I’m confused.

I know, whoever knew a creature who could have such luscious antlers could run a forum.

@OP, speak directly to Moparisthebest. I can guarantee you that he isn’t here for the money, I along with most staff members speak with him on a regular basis and money is no incentive to him. Infact, all of the money from the status page is left stationary in his PayPal until such time it’s paid to someone for creating a stable, well programmed and content-filled server base. You should also know that Administrators don’t moderate anything. Moderation is done by moderators so it’s more than likely one of us gmods removed your posts because of the spammer. Moparisthebest hasn’t worked on the status page because he simply doesn’t have time, it’s on github open sourced for others to work on it but no-one ever does, sadly. You should really do your homework before you start making accusations like this.
[/quote]What?!? PAYPAL??? Does travis not know how many people they’ve robbed?[/quote]
As long as you run your service to comply with their rules, you won’t get any issues :).

Read full topic
